Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class SocketClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.SocketClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientHandler, Runnable
public class SocketClientHandler extends Object implements ClientHandler, Runnable
ClientHandler implementation that handles the communication between a Client and the Server.

    void
    handleClientConnection()
    Reads messages from the associated client after deserializing the message; if it is a login request, it adds the SocketClient to the client list, otherwise it just sends the message to the SocketServer -> Server -> GameController.

      Specified by:

    • handleClientConnection

      public void handleClientConnection() throws IOException
      Reads messages from the associated client after deserializing the message; if it is a login request, it adds the SocketClient to the client list, otherwise it just sends the message to the SocketServer -> Server -> GameController.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there are IOErrors.

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Returns a flag that indicates if the SocketClient is still connected.
      Specified by:
      isConnected in interface ClientHandler
      Returns:
      true if the client is still connected, false otherwise.

    • sendMessageAndQuit

      public void sendMessageAndQuit(Message message)
      Sends a message to the associated SocketClient, and quits the ended match.
      Specified by:
